abstract: Some are observing a generational shift as Jewish youth in Israel express a distinct anti-Arab attitude that was not learned in the home.
article: Killing of Palestinian Youth Puts an Israeli Focus on Extremism
author: By STEVEN ERLANGER
title: Killing of Palestinian Youth Puts an Israeli Focus on Extremism

abstract: An architect with experience restoring a Brutalist building designed by Paul Rudolph is making a proposal to buy and preserve another Rudolph building under threat in Goshen, N.Y.
author: By ROBIN POGREBIN
copyright: Randy Harris for The New York Times
title: Rethinking a Spurned Landmark

abstract: Separatist rebels retreated Monday from positions throughout eastern Ukraine and began building barricades in Donetsk and Luhansk in anticipation of a final stand against advancing government troops.
article: Ukraine Rebels Are Retreating for Last Stand
author: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN
title: Ukraine Rebels Are Retreating for Last Stand

abstract: A developer wants to get rid of the street going to a century-old trading post turned museum, but who controls the road is in dispute.
article: A Century-Old Landmark of the Everglades Confronts the Possible End of the Road
author: By LIZETTE ALVAREZ
copyright: Scott McIntyre for The New York Times
title: A Century-Old Landmark of the Everglades Confronts the Possible End of the Road
